Index.title: Cuto Wallpaper
Index.description: Cuto is an iOS/Android app dedicated for bringing great wallpapers. Every wallpaper in Cuto is handpicked by our editors, only to deliver you a more suitable wallpaper.

Reset.resetSuccess: A password reset email has been sent to your mailbox.
Reset.resetInstructions: Please follow the instructions in the email.
Reset.setpassSuccess: Your password has been reset successfully.
Reset.setpassHint: New password must be at least 6 characters, and is not full numeric or common password

Redeem.redeemSuccess: Congratulations! You have successfully redeemed Cuto Pro.
Redeem.redeemInstructions: If you don't have a Cuto account, this will create one for you.
Redeem.setpassHint: The password must be at least 6 characters, and is not full numeric or common password
